::Perndabot::

"I am Perndabot, an Alliance member," the bot responds as he is 
contacted by Predacons, "Zardus sent me here to discuss a possible 
peace treaty with your faction."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Darkfate::
> Alarms started rang and Darkfate walked towards the computer that 
was 
> instaled inside his quarters.
> 
> "Unknow signature in Our Territory" said the computer.
> 
> "Close units" asked Darkfate.
> 
> "Charon, Deepfear, and the bat probes" answered the computer
> 
> "Tell them about our visitor... They'll open fire until I tell the 
> signal" said Darkfate, he opened his comm link and said "Whoever 
you 
> are... Identify now; What do you want? and Who are you?"
